name: Mage Quit
description:
Stuck in a shadow realm, you have to use your three orbs of power in order to get past the creatures that guard the exit

A game made in 8 weeks by students at The Game Assembly school in Malmö, Sweden.

Graphics:

Max Kock

Anes Sabanovic

Felicia Johansson

Sebastian Schaffer

Animators:

Arvid Aspeborg

Moa Bergman

Programmers:

Ventus Andersson

Niklas Fredriksson

Max Hartell

Ivar Jönsson

Henrik Park

Carl Uvebrant


Level Designers:

Elias Carlsson

Christoffer Carlsvärd
